onboarding.text1: Welcome on our journey to fight food waste and
onboarding.text_headline: Choose from restaurants and cafes close to you.

second.text_headline: Do not worry! You can use all payment channels.

third.text_headline: You can get your package from the restaurant or the restaurant will send it to you.

forth.text_headline: Thanks for helping us protect the world!
